mapper.sql: id, owner_no, activity_id, prize_id, create_date, create_time, is_enter, is_enter_descs
mapper.insert: insert into draw (id, owner_no, activity_id, prize_id, create_date, create_time, is_enter, is_enter_descs) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{ownerNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{activityId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{prizeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isEnter,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isEnterDescs,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into draw
id,
owner_no,
activity_id,
prize_id,
create_date,
create_time,
is_enter,
is_enter_descs,
#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{ownerNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.update:
update draw
owner_no = #{ownerNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
activity_id = #{activityId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
prize_id = #{prizeId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=DATE},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
is_enter = #{isEnter,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_enter_descs = #{isEnterDescs,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update draw set owner_no = #{ownerNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, activity_id = #{activityId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, prize_id = #{prizeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=DATE}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, is_enter = #{isEnter,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_enter_descs = #{isEnterDescs,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
